thread.title: 50 on Fire is Back at Howard Theatre on Dec. 10th [Event]
thread.title_full: 50 on Fire is Back at Howard Theatre on Dec. 10th [Event]

author: Christine Healy
title: 50 on Fire is Back at Howard Theatre on Dec. 10th [Event]
text:
SHARE 50 on Fire is Back at Howard Theatre on Dec. 10th [Event] Submit your 50 on Fire nomination here!It's official! 50 on Fire is back at Howard Theatre on December 10th from 7 to 10 p.m. Last year, TO Submit your 50 on Fire nomination here! 
It's official! 50 on Fire is back at Howard Theatre on December 10th from 7 to 10 p.m. Last year, the historic D.C. venue housed a red-hot cocktail party and we can't wait to do it all over again. We'll be celebrating the District's most disruptive innovators and you won't want to miss the celebration. Inno Insider discounted tickets expire tomorrow, October 9th at 12:00 p.m., then prices will increse. Get your 50 on Fire tickets now! 
Since we can't wait until December, we're also hosting three Meet the Judges Meetups this fall that will provide attendees a more intimate opportunity to connect with our expert judges. Join us at the first meetup at Johnny Pistolas next Wednesday, October 14th from 6 to 8pm. Get your $10 ticket, that includes your first drink and apps, here . Hurry because space is limited. 
Lastly, make sure to submit your nominations by October 23rd. Send us your favorite game-changers in Civic (Smart City), Design, Education, Government & Advocacy, Healthcare & Medicine, Investment, Lifestyle, Marketing & Advertising, and Technology . 
Submit a nomination now and take advantage of your last chance to buy Inno Insider tickets here or below. Want to align your brand with 50 on Fire and DC Inno events? Click here for more information.
